subject: Career Counseling
body: Get professional career advice from expert counselors.
description: Receive one-on-one counseling sessions to explore your career options and make informed decisions.

subject: Resume Building
body: Create a professional resume that stands out.
description: Craft a visually appealing and ATS-friendly resume tailored to your career goals.

subject: Interview Preparation
body: Prepare for your interviews with mock sessions and tips.
description: Get expert guidance and practice sessions to build confidence for your job interviews.

subject: Career Mapping
body: Map out your career path with the help of a professional counselor.
description: Work on long-term strategies to align your career goals with your strengths and interests.

subject: Skill Development
body: Enhance your skills with personalized learning plans.
description: Access tailored resources and expert advice to upskill and stay competitive.

subject: Job Search Assistance
body: Get help in finding job opportunities and applying to positions.
description: Navigate the job market with expert guidance to secure your ideal role.

subject: Personal Branding
body: Build your personal brand to stand out in your industry.
description: Develop a strong personal brand to showcase your unique expertise and values.

subject: Networking Skills
body: Master the art of professional networking and make valuable connections.
description: Learn techniques to expand your professional network and build lasting relationships.

subject: Time Management
body: Improve your productivity with effective time management strategies.
description: Adopt proven methods to manage your time effectively and achieve your goals.
